div:
Introduction This resource is an observation of a Mammography Density. It is typically one observation of a set of related observations that comprise a finding. This and its related obsevations are all referenced by a parent 'section' observation by that parents 'Observation.hasMember' element.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of:
what resources reference Mammography Density
what resources Mammography Density references
Review Status
NotReviewed Comments and Suggested changes to this implementation guide van be made here
Member Fields
The following are parts of this observation that are contained within this resource.
Each field contains one data item and is stored as an item (slice) in the Observation.component element.
BiRads Assessment Category component [0..1]
Density component [0..1]
Margin component [0..1]
MG AbnormalityDensity Type component [1..1]
Observed Change In Abnormality component [0..*]
Observed Count component [0..1]
Orientation of an abnormality component [0..1]
Shape component [0..1]
Size of an abnormality component [0..1]
Member Observations
The following are parts of this observation that are stored in seperate observation resources.
The reference to each external observation is stored as an item in the Observation.hasMember element.
'Associated Features' reference [0..1]
'Consistent With' reference [0..*]
Profile Fragments
The following are the fragments that are included in this profile. This is included for developers use to understand the hierarchy and commonality of disparate profiles..
BreastRad Observation NoDevice Fragment
Common Targets Fragment
MG Shape Targets Fragment
Observation Leaf Fragment
